images.caption: Fig. 1:(Top left) image generated by a txt2img model using the prompt “A painting of a giraffe in the Analytical Cubism style.” with the corresponding heatmaps for (top center) content and (top right) style components. (Bottom) image and heatmaps from “A cow with Rembrandt style.”

Fig. 2:Content-Style IoU score (IoUCS\text{IoU}_{\text{CS}}IoU start_POSTSUBSCRIPT CS end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, solid line) is compared against the Baseline IoU score (mIoUB\text{mIoU}_{\text{B}}mIoU start_POSTSUBSCRIPT B end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, dashed line) and their difference (Δ\Deltaroman_Δ, dotted line) across varying threshold values (τ\tauitalic_τ). Markers on the IoU curves are sized proportionally to the mean support of the corresponding sets used in the computation.
